name: Super MagLama
description:
A tribute to the recently released Super Magbot, a precision 2D platformer with a twist: YOU CAN'T JUMP. Master your magnetic powers to get through each level with agility.

Controls:
Gamepad: Left Stick to move, LB and RB to use magnetic force.
Keyboard: WASD to move, mouse left and right button to use magnetic force.

For some reason, the browser version is having trouble detecting keyboard input. Therefore, it is recommended to play the desktop version.

I made this game for fun, and it's not complete. However, all feedback is welcome. Thanks!
